channel.title: [317 PI] Armored Gaming Community!
channel.description:
[size=40pt][center][b]Welcome to Armored Gamming Community![/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://armoredgamingco.enjin.com/forum]FORUMS[/url][/b] [center][b][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/490lzdn67cvp43p/AGCclient.jar]PLAY NOW[/url][/b][/center] [center][b]Gmail: armoredgamingco@gmail.com[/b][/center] [center][b]Skype: armoredgamingco[/b][/center] [center][b]Teamspeak ip: armoredgaming.no-ip.biz[/b][/center]
[center][b]Armored Gaming is built for the players and their wants, Unlike other private servers Armored Gaming has a Staff Team that is working hard to make sure players have a fun, exciting gaming experience, We listen to you![/b][/center]
[center][b]Features:[/b][/center] [center]We have a decent xp rate, x600, unlike other servers that max you out upon logging in![/center] [center]Fast and helpful and continously growing community![/center] [center]A dedicated owner who's updating everyday and quick to fix and always open for ideas![/center] [center]Team bosses and custom bosses![/center] [center]Great looking custom items with fair stats![/center] [center]Friendly, active, helpful and mature staff team![/center] [center]We have 15 prestige level, points and shop with the best weapons in-game (combat skills 99 only)![/center] [center]Every prestige level has its unique us military rank icon and title![/center] [center]25 skills - 100% working![/center] [center]Custom Rare Summoning NPC's[/center] [center]A teamspeak server for faster and easier communication - no other rsps offers![/center] [center]An auto donation system, allowing you to get your items instantly![/center] [center]Highly responsive owner and always reachable via Teamspeak, Email or Forums![/center] [center]Join Now test it yourself, you have nothing to lose![/center] [/size] [center][b]Media:[/b][/center] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ukv0fYzTyr4 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKlh2hTZB4E
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s24.postimg.org/4fnk1pjud/client_bg.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s17.postimg.org/yssi50ssv/home.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s30.postimg.org/7jxrl6iyp/Donatorzone.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s15.postimg.org/94icg7uwr/Dung.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s24.postimg.org/j3oav0v5h/Frosts.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s16.postimg.org/6yjmtqxxx/tournaments.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s16.postimg.org/qkcp3opqt/more_bosses.png[/img][/url]

[center][b]Thanks for reading! We hope to see you in-game![/b][/center]

[size=40pt][center]Welcome to Armored Gamming Community![/center]

[center]Armored Gaming is built for the players and their wants, Unlike other private servers Armored Gaming has a Staff Team that is working hard to make sure players have a fun, exciting gaming experience, We listen to you![/center]

[center]Features:[/center]
[center]We have a decent xp rate, x600, unlike other servers that max you out upon logging in![/center]
[center]Fast and helpful and continously growing community![/center]
[center]A dedicated owner who’s updating everyday and quick to fix and always open for ideas![/center]
[center]Team bosses and custom bosses![/center]
[center]Great looking custom items with fair stats![/center]
[center]Friendly, active, helpful and mature staff team![/center]
[center]We have 15 prestige level, points and shop with the best weapons in-game (combat skills 99 only)![/center]
[center]Every prestige level has its unique us military rank icon and title![/center]
[center]25 skills - 100% working![/center]

[center]A teamspeak server for faster and easier communication - no other rsps offers![/center]
[center]An auto donation system, allowing you to get your items instantly![/center]
